protein.general_function: Involved in G-protein coupled receptor activity
protein.specific_function: Receptor for glutamate. The activity of this receptor is mediated by a G-protein that activates a phosphatidylinositol- calcium second messenger system. May participate in the central action of glutamate in the CNS, such as long-term potentiation in the hippocampus and long-term depression in the cerebellum

go_class.description: cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
